how-many-weeks-left.title: How many weeks left?
how-many-weeks-left.subtitle: Fuel your midlife crisis with statistics
how-many-weeks-left.description: This website calculates your life expectancy based on your birthdate and demographic, showing you how much time of your life you already wasted and, more importantly, how many weeks are left until you (statistically) die. The calculation is based on data by The World Bank Group. Use with caution; feelings of self-loath, remorse, and anxiety may occur.

bloclock.title: Bloclock
bloclock.subtitle: A clock showing you the time you've left before you go to bed
bloclock.description: Bloclock gives you a visual overview of the time in your day that is left and has passed. The clock consists of a 10x10 grid in which each block resembles 10 minutes, adding up to a total of roughly 17 hours, thus showing only the time an average human is awake. When you go to bed, all of your blocks will be gone. This way of time framing makes you more aware of how you spend your time, hopefully leading to less time wasted on things that don't matter.

virtualeye.title: VirtualEye
virtualeye.description: In an age of algorithmic matchmaking, virtual reality porn and ʻrent-a-girlfriendʼ-services, love seems to become more and more commodified. VirtualEye is a dystopian concept in which even something as intimate as eye contact has become a product for consumption. The mixed reality application projects a virtual person onto your surroundings, enabling you to stare into their eyes at any moment, feeling their presence as if it were a real person.
